content.content: By using ERC20 tokens on an EVM-compatible public blockchain to play the lottery Lotteries can be conducted at low cost, with strict privacy, high return rates, and traceability guaranteed, without having to go through a lottery management organization. Winners are determined by randomly generated numbers on the blockchain. How do you think lottery contract? smart contract code   GitHub    GitHub - Foxlottery/foxlottery-v1: smart contract code smart contract code. Contribute to Foxlottery/foxlottery-v1 development by creating an account on GitHub.      whitepaper https://whitepaper.foxlottery.org/en.html
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining their proposal for a lottery smart contract using ERC20 tokens on a public blockchain. They provide links to the smart contract code and whitepaper. A 3rd party is asked for feedback on the lottery contract and the post also includes an advertisement for the smart contract. Additionally, the post invites questions about the proposal and constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: Nice job! I have just noticed your ILottery interface only have one method and missing the other methods of your contract.
